name: @sitcs/ng-devkit-core
description: Angular DevKit - Core Utility Library for SITCS Schematics
author: Shelby M. Smull - Owner @ Smull IT Consulting Services
contributors: Shelby M. Smull - Owner @ Smull IT Consulting Services
maintainers: Shelby M. Smull - Owner @ Smull IT Consulting Services

scripts.t: cls && npm run b && jasmine src/**/*_spec.js
scripts.p: cls && npm run t && npm pack
scripts.push: cls && npm run t && npm publish && npm i -g @sitcs/ng-devkit-core
